gym_esper_030_receptionist_02: Congratulations! You pass the Gym Test!

gym_esper_030_trainer_01:
You have to report your passing grade to the
lobby staffer to formally finish the Gym Test!\c
Oh, and ESP actually stands for “[VAR COLOR(0006)]extrasensory[VAR COLOR(0000)]
[VAR COLOR(0006)]perception[VAR COLOR(0000)].” Tulip made up “Emotional Spectrum\r
Practice” herself. Don’t get that wrong on a test![VAR 0114(0024)]

new kid![VAR 0114(0024)]
